answers.answer: I get it too. It's probably the way the babies positioned. But if it worries you that much, tell your doctor.
If nothing makes it go away or lessen the pain...you should contact your doc or l&d as abdominal pain that doesn't subside is a sign or preeclampsia

Probably just your growing uterus. Its getting closer and closer to ur ribs. Mine hurt all the time around that week. It'll go away soon but it never hurts to call and ask ur Dr if ur really worried about it
It's your bra those things put a lot of pressure on everything I had to switch to sports bras .I'm a very bust girl though.

question: So I'm 29+5 and since a few hours ago I have been getting this sharp burning pain in the middle of my upper stomach like right below where my bra is. I have tried changing positions and walking and nothing's helping. Does anyone know what it is? Cause it has me kind of freaked out.
title: Upper abdominal pain
